prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language is a human-understandable markup language for creating AI applications such as chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, avatars, translators, and automations.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Book language, markup language, AI applications, chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, avatars, translators, automations, human-understandable
